name: No Asylum!
description:
This is the the next big thing in Real Time Tactics Genre. Help the player escape this asylum and his inner demons. 

Were you a commandos fan when you were younger and have been wanting to play more games like that (Shadow Tactics,Desperados) Look no further.

 I am a solo Indie game dev who recently quit his job and went full time into Dev. If I get in the top 100, will release more free levels and eventually release a much more polished full game.
